name: Subacute Hypersensitivity Pneumonitis
chief_complaint: I've had this dry cough and shortness of breath for weeks, and it's getting worse when I'm at work.
prognosis: Good with early recognition and antigen avoidance, but may progress to pulmonary fibrosis if exposure continues
description: An immune-mediated inflammatory lung disease caused by repeated inhalation of organic antigens (in this case likely avian proteins from patient's parrot breeding hobby). Characterized by lymphocytic infiltration and granuloma formation in the lung parenchyma.
